Parabola.io | San Francisco (SOMA) | Full-time | ONSITE

Parabola is eliminating the busywork in knowledge workers' daily tasks.

Our drag-and-drop web app lets marketing, sales, and operations people build functional data flows to automate processes, integrate tools, and generate custom reports.

We're a small but highly focused team backed with seed funding from some of the top VCs in Silicon Valley. We're always interested in hiring amazing engineers, but we're also currently hiring our first marketing person.

As the first marketing person on the team, you would be instrumental in helping us ideate, develop, and test the strategies to educate the world about how to have the same success our highly passionate early customer base has had with Parabola.

If you're interested, reach out at hi@parabola.io.
